text: Then they came to Jericho. Now as Jesus was going out from Jericho, along with his disciples and a large crowd, 10:46 the blind man Bartimaeus, son of Timaeus, ¦ Bartimaeus the son of Timaeus, a blind man, ANT ¦ Bartimaeus the son of Timaeus, a blind CTthe blind man Bartimaeus, son of Timaeus, 10:46 was sitting by the road begging 98.5% ¦ beggar, was sitting by the road CT 0.4%was sitting by the road begging.
